member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.CoreUIApplication
member.summary: Represents an application that has an UI screen. The events for resuming and pausing are provided.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.CoreUIApplication.#ctor
member.remarks: The default backend for the UI application will be used.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.CoreUIApplication.#ctor(Tizen.Applications.CoreBackend.ICoreBackend)
member.remarks: If you want to change the backend, use this constructor.
member.param: The backend instance implementing the ICoreBacked interface.

member.name: E:Tizen.Applications.CoreUIApplication.Resumed
member.summary: Occurs whenever the application is resumed.

member.name: E:Tizen.Applications.CoreUIApplication.Paused
member.summary: Occurs whenever the application is paused.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.CoreUIApplication.Run(System.String[])
member.summary: Runs the UI application's main loop.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.CoreUIApplication.OnPreCreate
member.summary: Overrides this method if you want to handle the behavior before calling OnCreate().

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.CoreUIApplication.OnResume
member.summary: Overrides this method if you want to handle the behavior when the application is resumed. If base.OnResume() is not called, the event 'Resumed' will not be emitted.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.CoreUIApplication.OnPause
member.summary: Overrides this method if you want to handle the behavior when the application is paused. If base.OnPause() is not called, the event 'Paused' will not be emitted.
